p.s: The newspaper article Language learning in the UK: can't, won't, don't was written by John Worne and published in the Telegraph on the 27. January 2015
John Worne says that less students are willing to study foreign languages.
Furthermore less A-level exams were taken than in the 1990s.
He mentions that the langauge learning is an essantialessential for the future of the UK and their global standing.
Moreover Worne says that two-thirds of the UK businesses need workers with foreign language skills.
And because more firms want to get into the fast growing markets he expects that they will need even more.
But a few forward-thinking universities are offering to study a language alongside another degree subject.
Besides a worker with foreign language skills is more in demand as a person without this skill.
At the end of the article he speaks out to the parents because in his opinion the education system can't fix this allonealone.
